SEARCH
Package bank

Class Bank

java.lang.Object
bank.Bank
public class Bank extends Object
Represents a bank with functionality to manage accounts, deposits, withdrawals, loans, and reserves. Provides checks and constraints to ensure valid operations within defined limits.

  • Constructor Summary

    • addAccount

      public void addAccount(String accountHolder, double initialDeposit) throws InvalidDepositAmountException, DuplicateAccountException
      Adds a new account with an initial deposit.
      Parameters:
      accountHolder - the name of the account holder
      initialDeposit - the initial deposit amount
      Throws:
      InvalidDepositAmountException - if the initial deposit is invalid
      DuplicateAccountException - if the account details are already in use

    • removeAccount

      public void removeAccount(String accountHolder) throws AccountNotFoundException, InvalidLoanAmountException, InsufficientReservesException
      Removes an account after validating its closure eligibility.
      Parameters:
      accountHolder - the name of the account holder
      Throws:
      AccountNotFoundException - if the account does not exist
      InvalidLoanAmountException - if the account has an outstanding loan
      InsufficientReservesException - if reserves are insufficient

      AccountNotFoundException - if the account does not exist

    • deposit

      public void deposit(String accountHolder, double amount) throws InvalidDepositAmountException, AccountNotFoundException
      Deposits an amount into an account.
      Parameters:
      accountHolder - the account holder's name
      amount - the deposit amount
      Throws:
      InvalidDepositAmountException - if the amount is invalid
      AccountNotFoundException - if the account does not exist

    • withdraw

      public void withdraw(String accountHolder, double amount) throws InsufficientFundsException, InsufficientReservesException, AccountNotFoundException, InvalidWithdrawalAmountException
      Withdraws an amount from an account.
      Parameters:
      accountHolder - the account holder's name
      amount - the withdrawal amount
      Throws:
      InsufficientFundsException - if the account has insufficient funds
      InsufficientReservesException - if reserves are insufficient
      AccountNotFoundException - if the account does not exist
      InvalidWithdrawalAmountException - if the amount is invalid

    • approveLoan

      public void approveLoan(String accountHolder, double loanAmount) throws InsufficientReservesException, AccountNotFoundException, InvalidLoanAmountException
      Approves a loan for an account.
      Parameters:
      accountHolder - the account holder's name
      loanAmount - the loan amount
      Throws:
      InsufficientReservesException - if reserves are insufficient
      AccountNotFoundException - if the account does not exist
      InvalidLoanAmountException - if the loan amount is invalid

    • repayLoan

      public void repayLoan(String accountHolder, double amount) throws AccountNotFoundException, InvalidLoanAmountException, InvalidDepositAmountException
      Repays a loan for an account.
      Parameters:
      accountHolder - the account holder's name
      amount - the repayment amount
      Throws:
      AccountNotFoundException - if the account does not exist
      InvalidLoanAmountException - if the repayment amount is invalid
      InvalidDepositAmountException - if the repayment amount is invalid
